full_summary:
==========

### Tender Announcement
===============

#### Information
--------------

* **Reference Number:** WS4310513116-Doc4310610363
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4310513116
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** December 18, 2023, at 14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

#### Tender Status
----------------

This tender is **Expired** as it has passed its closing date.

#### Contract Information
-----------------------

* **Expected Contract Start Date:** None
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None

#### Tender Highlights
----------------------

* **Procurement Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Regions of Delivery:** Nova Scotia
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None

#### Trade Agreements
------------------

This tender is open to all suppliers who are eligible to participate in the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)

#### Contracting Entity and End User
------------------------------------

* **Contracting Entity Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entities Name:** Department of National Defence (DND)

#### Contact Information
----------------------

For any inquiries or questions, please contact:

* Name: Kate Mintzer (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: kate.mintzer@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* URL:  [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18079048?extsite=MTgwNzkwNDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18079048?extsite=MTgwNzkwNDhfQU
